body:
• Too much to cover off in this talk
  • Lots of quality resources
    • Vector Clocks - Wikipedia
    • Vector Clocks - Basho
    • Why Vector Clocks are Easy - Basho
    • Why Vector Clocks are Hard - Basho

Make sure you read the blog post comments for more information.


In short, they help keep shit in sync and help us figure out what shit clashes and when.

We can talk about them at the end during question time if you want
